Texts.Chs: 我应该和Xolotl谈谈，如果激光束是这里的最基础的防御武器，那么在接下来的工程中，我们到底需要加装什么样的武器才符合标准？这肯定违反了安全条例所明确的一些事项。
Texts.Eng: I ought to speak to Xolotl about this. If the Charge Beam is to be the most basic of weaponry in this line, then what are we going to have to put up with in the future? This must break several safety regulations.

Texts.Chs: 负责这项工程的人真是个重度的偏执狂，这建筑明显有太多不合理之处，因为当你走在走廊上时你还得担心无处不在的锯片把自己的头给切了。
Texts.Eng: The paranoia of the project lead is great. Perhaps not unjustifiably so, but still it's annoying when you're walking down the hallway and a stray sawblade nearly takes your head off.
